ab.rs: tshad ma sde bdun gyi don phyogs cig du bsdus pa gzhan gyi phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba(g)zha(n) gyi phyogs tha(ms cad) las rnam par rgyal ba [zhes bya ba] |

body.ab: dbu ma snang sel ba kha cig snang ba dgag bya yin zer ro ||

yang dbu ma ba kha cig snang pa la bden par zhen pa'i blo dgag bya yin ste | nyes pa thams cad
kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro zer ro ||

chos kyi seng ge na re snang ba stong ba'i tshogs don de bsgrub
bya yin zhing | snang ldog kun rdzob kyi bden pa stong ldog don dam pa'i bden pa bden 2 ngo bo 1 pa yin no zhe na | snang ba dang ngo bo 1 pa'i stong nyid de
don dam
pa'i bden pa ma yin te | skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir te | snang ba skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir ro | gzhan yang don dam bden pa skye 'gag byed par thal |
snang pa skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir | rtags tshad ma khyab pa med na bden gnyis ngo bo gcig pa nyams so || 'dod na 'gag pa med pa skye med pa zhes so ||

gangs can pa thams cad sems tsam pa gnyis ka'i lugs
'gog pa ni | rang gzhung sems tsam du bshad pa dang 'gal lo ||

chos kyi seng ge na re rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni don spyi 'dzin pa yin
no zer ro ||
brtson 'grus seng ge na re rtog pa'i mtshan nyid sgra don 'dzin pa yin zer ro ||

chos kyi seng ge na re mtshan nyid tha snyad kyi mtshan nyid ni chos 3 tshang pa yin no || gsum pa gang zhe na | mtshan gzhi la grub pa dang | rdzas su yod pa dang | rigs mi
mthun gyi spyi dang | dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin no zhe na | de ltar na mtshan nyid kyi rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin nam mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin | dang po ltar na bum pa mi rtag par mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe | mtshan nyid
skyon med du thal | chos 3 po de thang pa'i phyir ro || 2 pa ltar na dkar zal ba glang du mtshon pa la nog shal lasogs pa 'dus pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe mtshan nyid skyon med ma yin par thal | mtshan nyid de mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun gyi spyi dang dngos 'gal ma yin pa'i phyir ro || ma grub na nog shal lasogs 'dus pa
de chon | ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung gi ltago pa yin par thal | ba lang gi tha snyad byar mi rung dang dngos 'gal yin pa'i phyir ro || ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung nyid bzhin no ||

brtson 'grus seng ge na re rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad du mtshon pa la mtshon bya'i don ldog gzhi la grub mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe
mtshan nyid skyon med yin zer ro ||
bsdus pa smra ba la mkhas par grags pa yang khan 3 du 'khams ngan zhes lan 'debs par snang ngo ||

brtson 'grus seng ge na re | mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de mtshan nyid ma yin pas nyes pa dang po med do || chos 3 tshang pa de mtshan nyid tha snyad kyis rang ldog la brten par ma zhugs pas mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de rigs mi mthun yin yang khyab ches par thal ba'i skyon med do || chos 3 tshang pa de mtshon ldan gyi
gzhi la zhugs pas | mtshon bya la mi srid par htla ba'i nyes pa med do || zhes zer ro ||
bya de rten kyi rigs mi mthun dang bsal bya rigs mi mthun 2 su yod pa de khong du ma chud par rang gi mtshon bya rigs mi mthun du 'thad do zhes zer ba ni shes pa bas smra ba rings pa'i gtam yin no ||

dang po ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje na re | rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni | chos gang zhigchos gang zhigchos kyi gang zhig mtshan gzhi la ji ltar bkod pa ltar grub cing don ldog
rkyangrkyangkyang par ma grub
pa'o zhe na | bum pa dngos po'i tha snyad du mtshon pa la ba lang gi tha snyad mtshan nyid du bkod pa de rang ldog rdzas ma grub ma yin
par thal | gzhi la grub ma tshang pa'i phyir | 'dod na rang ldog rdzas yod du thal lo || des na rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni chos gang zhig don ldog rkyangrkyangkyang par ma grub
pa'o ||

'di la brtson 'grus seng ge na re gzhan gyi mtshon bya mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba yod pa yin te | nog shal lasogs 'dus pa mtshon bya | ba lang gi tha nsyad dang po de ba lang gi tha snyad 2 pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba bzhin no | zhes zer ba ni

chos kyi seng ge na re byas pa'i tha snyad byas pa'i tha snyad du mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa de mtshon 'dod med nas mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi la
mi srid pa yin ste | mtshan gzhi dang mtshon bya tha dad med pa'i phyir ro zhe na | ba lang gi tha snyad tshad mas grub pa'i tshe nog shal lasogs 'dus pa de ba lang gi tha snyad la ltos te mtshan nyid skyon myed po ma yin par thal |
mtshon 'dod med pa'i phyir ro || rtags tshad ma | khyab pa med na mtshon 'dod med pa mtshan nyid kyi skyon
yin pa nyams so ||

brton 'grus seng ge na re | sems can rtsam po la ba lang gi tha snyad khyab byed du mod (read: med) par mtshon
************* mtshon par mi nus pas mtshan nyid kyi skyon can yin no || de yang mtshon bya la ltos pa'i skyon ma yin ste mtshan nyid kyis mtshan gzhi la ma khyab pa'i skyon yin no zhe na | rten rtsam du yod pa de gang zhes dri'o ||

lnga pa ni brtson 'grus seng ge na rena rena re || dkar zal mtshan gzhi ba lang gi tha snyad dkar zal kho na la yod par mtshon | nog shal laosgs 'dus pa dkar zla kho na la yod pa mtshan nyid du
bkod pa'i tshe | khyab ches nas mtshan gzhi la mi srid pa yin lo | gang la khyab ches nasnasna mtshan gzhi dkar
zal las gzhan nag sgyur la khyab ches pa yin zer ro ||

dang po ni lo tsha ba na re mtshan nyid kyi skyon 3 du ma 'dus pa rnamrnamrnams bcad med pa zhes bya ba'i skyon gzhan bzhi pa yang yod de | bum pa byas par mtshon pa la rgyu
rkyen las skyes pa'i shes bya mtshan nyid du bkod pa lta bu yin zhes
zer ro || tik chung las |
mtshan nyid rnam bcad la ltos phyir ||
rnam bcad med pa mtshan nyid min zhes so ||

gnyis pa ni rin chen grags na re mtshan nyid kyi skyon thams cad mtshon bya mtshonmtshonmtshan pa'i rgyu mtshan du mi srid par 'dus zer ro || In work (ID:5507), this view is ascribed to Gangs pa she'u (ID:3810).
brtson 'grus seng ge na re mtshon bya'i tha snyadkyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par bzhag bya gzhi la grub pa yin zer ro ||

bdag gi yongs su 'dzin pa na re |na re |na re rdzas chos ldog chos kyi mtshan nyidmtshan nyid(mtshan nyid) ni rim pa bzhinbzhin(bzhin) du rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos ma lus pa la khyab byed du brtenbrtenrten pa dang | rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos 'ga' zhig la brtenbrtenrten yang 'ga'
zhig la mi
rten pa yin zer ro ||

bgag gi yongs su 'dzin pa na re |na re |na re 'jig medmyedmed la byas yod bkag pa lta bu'i med dgag de rtags kyi bsgrub bya yin zhing rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin la | 'jig med dang byas'jig myed byas'jig med dang byas
yod kyis stong pa'i tshogs don ma yin dgag de yang rtags kyi
bsgrub bya dang rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin lo ||
dang po ni lo tsha ba chen po de na re | ljon shing 'gror snang gi shes pa kha dog la tshad ma yin zer ro ||

lo tsha ba ni don dang 'thun par 'dzin pa de yin no || zhe na |des na gcung lo tsha ba ni don dang mthun par 'dzin pa de yin no zhe na |
zla ba 2 'dzin gyi shes pa chos can | don dang mthun par 'dzin pa tsam zhig yin par thal |
shes bya'i don dang mthun par 'dzin pa'i phyir rote || zla ba 2
'dzin kyikyi rnam pa shes bya yin zhing der 'dzin pa'i phyir ro ||
pa'i ldog pa ma yin pa'i phyiro zhe na | 'di'i len du chos kyi seng ge na re rang yul la ltos te rtog pa'i rdzas dang bral ba de yin zer ro ||
brtson 'grus seng ge rtog par mtshon pa'i mtshan gzhi ma yin pa de yin no zer |

kha cig mthun phyogs mi mthun phyogs kyi tshyad
ni bsgrub bya chon dang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa dang mi mthun pa de yin no zhe na |

brtson 'grus seng ge na re rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub kyang phyogs 1 la ma grub pa ni sgra la
rtsol byung khyab byed du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'am | sgra la rtsol byung rten rtsam du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'o || zhes zer ro ||

phyogs chos grub pas grub pa yin te | rigs kyi bye brag snang pa dang stong pa'i tshogs don chos can bsgrub pa'i tha snyad du byar rung ste | bsgrub chos ma dor ba yin pa'i phyir zhes rtags su bkod pa'i tshe | bsgrub chos ma dor ba de stong nyid la ma grub kyang snang pa la grub pas snang stong tshogs pa la brten pa'i phyogs chos grub pa bzhin no ||
spyi rtags su bkod pa'i tshe bye brag cig chos can la ma grub kyang bye brag 1 chos can la grub na phyogs chos grub pas khyab pa yin ste | rigs kyi bye brag grub pas spyi 'grub pa'i phyir | spyi chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe chos can gyi bye brag 1 la rtags grub kyang chos can gyi bye brag 1 'ang rtags ma grub na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin no || zhes chos 46b9 kyi seng ge smra'o ||
chos kyi seng ge na re rtags kyi tshyad phyoos dang ldog pa'i khyab pa 2 yin zhing rjes 'gro yod kyang rtags kyi tshyad ma yin no zer ro ||

kun gyi bshes gnyen na re | go byed rtags kyi 'brel pa don la med de | spyi 'brel don la med pa'i phyir te | spyi don la med pa'i phyir dang | chos 1 la
'brel pa mi 'thad cing 'brel pa po 'brel yul gyi chos 2 tshogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro ||
'brel pa brtags pa las | de phyir dngos po thams cad kyi || 'brel pa yang dag nyid du med ces so || des na 48b5 'brel pa don la med pas bsgrub bya'i chos dang rtags kyang don la med ces grag go ||

chos kyi seng ge na re thal 'gyur rang rgyud la mi 'khrul
ba yin te | de ('di) 2 rtogs pa gnad 1 pa'i phyir ro ||

rigs pa'i de nyid gsal ba 'dis ||
'gro ba kun gyi mi shes pa'i ||
mun pa thams cad gsal gyur nas ||
rigs
pa'i de nyid mthong bar shog |||

gzhan gyi phyogs thams cad las rnaM par rgyal ba zhes bya ba | rigs par smra ba'i dge slong sing ha shris gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang du legs par brtsaMs te | dpal rtse dkar gyi gtsug lag khang du yi ger bkod pa'o || rdzogs s+ho || ma nu sa rwa'i don du gyur 1 || dge'o || bkra' shis par gyur 1 ||

ab.l: rigs pa'i de nyid gsal ba 'dis ||
'gro ba kun gyis mi shes pa'i ||
mun pa thams cad bsal gyur nas ||
rigs pa'i de nyid mthong par shog ||

body.ab:
rigs pa'i de nyid gsal ba zhes bya ba | rigs pas smra
ba'i dge' sbyong sing ha shris gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang du legs par brtsams te || dpal rtse dkar gyi gtsug lag khang du yi ger bkod pa'o || bkra shis par gyur cig ||
